TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CustomTypeDescriptor extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class CustomTypeDescriptor Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供 介面的簡單預設實作。

span.span: Provides a simple default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像是，則類別類型的父物件必須仰賴在建構期間所提供。Like , the class relies on a parent object of type supplied during construction. 這可讓衍生自類別選擇性地覆寫方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式相當於呼叫另建構函式的參數與`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter that is `null`. 所有方法建立與這個建構函式會傳回預設值。All methods of a created with this constructor will return default values.

span.span: The parent custom type descriptor.

summary.span: 使用父自訂型別描述項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent custom type descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`參數是`null`，則所有方法會傳回預設值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否則，所有方法會將委派的方法`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 大部分方法會傳回`null`預設。Most methods return `null` by default. 下表顯示不會傳回方法的傳回值`null`預設。The following table shows the return values for the methods that do not return `null` by default. |方法Method|預設的傳回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||空的屬性集合 ()。An empty attribute collection ().| ||預設值執行個體。The default instance.| ||空白的事件集合 ()。An empty events collection ().| ||空的屬性集合 ()。An empty property collection ().|

summary.span: 傳回這個型別描述項所表示之型別的自訂屬性集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom attributes for the type represented by this type descriptor.
An containing the attributes for the type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果父自訂型別描述元傳遞至建構函式，方法會呼叫父代的對應方法。If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the constructor, the method will call the parent's corresponding method.
